landing.title: We do cool things that matter

description.description: GDG Algiers is a local community located at the National Higher School of Computer Science, Algiers, Algeria.It is part of the big global community of developers "Google Developers Group" (960 communities worldwide) Our community is made up of passionate developers and motivated young students.It has started from the simple status of GTUG (Google Technology User Group) in 2011 to become today one of the most active GDGs in the MENA region.GDG Algiers Chapter hosts a variety of technical activities for developers through the different events we organize, aiming to help the developers community get the latest technology updates.

previous.title: HashCode 2019
previous.content: HashCode is a Google programming competition where teams are gathered in a yearly organized hub by GDG Algiers to solve an engineering problem in a competitve atmosphere.
previous.location:
Higher School Of Computer Science 
 (ESI Algiers)

previous.title: Devfest 2019
previous.content: DevFest in one of GDG Algiers' biggest traditional events. It's a festival gathering the development loving community in a well-executed cocktail of talks and workshops revolving around the latest technologies available, especially Google's. Devfest 2018 & Devfest 2019 had a very large resonance thanks to "Digital well-being and Diversity and Inclusion" themed hackathons and the rich workshops and talks held by experts which took place over 3 consecutive days.
previous.location: ENP Incubator at Ecole National Supérieure Polytechnique

previous.title: GDG School 2019
previous.content: GDG School is an internal gdg event for our dear new members where old members do training sessions in different technologies like : web , mobile , ML , cloud ... the aim from it is breaking the ice between the new members and the old ones and creating a comfortable environnement for networking and learning , gdg school's end goal is training beginners to be trainers in the future
previous.location:
Higher School Of Computer Science 
 (ESI Algiers)

previous.title: HashCode 2020
previous.content: HashCode is a Google programming competition where teams are gathered in a yearly organized hub by GDG Algiers to solve an engineering problem in a competitve atmosphere.
previous.location:
Higher School Of Computer Science 
 (ESI Algiers)

previous.title: FAST & HACK 20
previous.content: After enormous positive feedback that we received last year, GDG Algiers has the pleasure to organize again the second edition of its original online Hackathon “Fast & Hack”! The main idea is to let developers from our community put their coding skills in use all while their fasting in this sacred month. We believe that hacking under such circumstances would give opportunity to some cool ideas that will certainly add value either spiritually or collectively to the society as we’re suggesting to the participants a variety of themes that they can be hacking in.This hackathon is for students, professionals, and programming enthusiasts who want to invest two weeks of their lives in building some cool stuff, that matter.

previous.title: ANDROID 11 MEETUP
previous.content: This is a global series of community-led online events connecting you with other developers near you to learn what you need to know to prepare for the next release of Android. Come together to learn about what's new in Android 11 and how to make your app compatible.

previous.title: DEVFEST 2020
previous.content:
GDG DevFests are large community-run developer events happening around the globe focused on community building and learning about Google’s technologies. 
 We organize DevFest 2019 in its 7th edition to offer speaker sessions, cdelabs, workshops and a Hackathon.

upcoming.title: Community Heroes - A week with us !
upcoming.content:
Not all heroes wear capes some use their screens to make this world a better place by learning and sharing their knowledge with the community 
They have a special name, and that is
Community Heroes 
Join us from January 6th to 12th as we introduce you to the beautiful world of GDG Algiers and WTM Algiers so you can be a community hero yourself !
